scripts.postcss: mkdir -p dist && find src ../../common -name '*.css' | xargs cat | postcss > dist/styles.css
scripts.postcss:minify: mkdir -p dist && find src ../../common -name '*.css' | xargs cat | postcss --env=minify > dist/styles.min.css
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn prepare-dist && yarn copy-common && yarn postcss && yarn postcss:minify
